# Commit format

``` 
[pkg](tag) Description
```

## Tags

**Developmental axis:**

| Tag      | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| (refact) |             |
| (test)   |             |

**Functional axis:**

| Tag    | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| (feat) |             |
| (fix)  |             |

**Operational axis:**

| Tag     | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| (build) |             |
| (cicd)  |             |
| (perf)  |             |

**Other:**

| Tag     | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| (clean) |             |
| (doc)   |             |
| (tool)  |             |
